This fork is distributed under GPL-2.0-or-later.

It includes code originally from Monocypher, which remains
BSD-2-Clause OR CC0-1.0 (see LICENCE.md for the original terms
and attribution).

It also includes a BLAKE3 implementation derived from the
BLAKE3 reference algorithm (CC0-1.0 OR Apache-2.0). This fork
treats that component as CC0-1.0 for compatibility with GPL-2.0-or-later.
